requirements: An application must be submitted to the Brewster County Groundwater Conservation District to obtain a permit for drilling a groundwater well.
Contact the Brewster County Groundwater Conservation District for specific details and guidance regarding the application process.
requirements.exemptions: No specific exemptions mentioned in the text; further inquiry with the BCGWCD is needed to determine if any wells are exempt.
requirements.explanation: The text indicates that well drilling permits are required and handled by the Brewster County Groundwater Conservation District, but it does not provide information on any exemptions from this requirement.
